summary: Arjun Krishna Ghosh is a Data & Cloud Analytics professional with 6+ years of experience spanning data engineering, analytics, and product intelligence. He has built and optimized cloud-native ETL/ELT pipelines, automated dashboards, and GenAI-powered assistants across connected-vehicle, telecom, and academic research domains.

technical: AWS (Glue, S3, Lambda, Redshift, DynamoDB, Bedrock, EC2)
ServiceNow Platform Analytics, Performance Analytics, Splunk
Generative AI (RAG, LLM integration, Bedrock, LangChain)
product_and_management: Product Roadmapping, UAT, A/B Testing, KPI Dashboards

achievements: Automated SLA tracking dashboards in ServiceNow using Performance Analytics, saving ~12 hours/month in manual reporting.
Built multi-tab dashboards (Case Data Analysis, Knowledge Management) covering volume, ART, escalations, and customer-level trends.
Delivered Tableau and Power BI analytics across 3M+ network events, improving visibility of uptime and reducing MTTR by 3.5 hours.
Enabled $60K/year SLA recovery through predictive incident detection and reduction of recurring NOC tickets.
Led cloud migration for Stellantis’ connected-vehicle platform (Uconnect / Free2Move), transitioning on-prem systems to AWS ahead of schedule.
Processed 200M+ monthly vehicle telemetry events using AWS Glue, Redshift, and S3; optimized ETL latency from 15 min to 3 min.
Developed dbt + Airflow data models powering subscription and UBI dashboards; improved safe-driving score accuracy from 82% → 96%.
Created cost-optimization dashboards cutting $400K+ annual hardware spend and 50% reduction in incident resolution time via Splunk monitoring.
Architected phased rollout for AWS migration (10% → 100% load) ensuring zero downtime and faster deployment validation.
Built AI-powered chatbot prototypes for academic support using Python + BERT + Flask.
Automated data collection and ETL for 5K+ survey responses per cycle, saving 15 hours/week and improving response rates by 22%.
Assisted in research on LLM and Hadoop-based analytics pipelines for Generative AI applications and graph-based fraud detection (Neo4j).

AdTech Data Platform.overview: End-to-end AdTech analytics platform that processes ~100K ad events/hour through Kafka → dbt → PostgreSQL, generating real-time ROAS and segmentation insights.
AdTech Data Platform.impact: Built a lightweight Decision Intelligence Assistant using RAG + LLMs enabling natural-language querying of campaign data, improving optimization speed by ~40%.

Fraud Detection with Neo4j.overview: Graph-based fraud detection system modeling transactions, shared identifiers, and high-risk jurisdictions to uncover suspicious money flows.
Fraud Detection with Neo4j.impact: Streamlined risk-detection logic and visualized networks of fraudulent entities using Neo4j and Streamlit.

Private Markets Portfolio Dashboard.overview: Power BI dashboard for StepStone-style investment analytics visualizing IRR, MOIC, and cash-flow trends across mock private-equity data.
Private Markets Portfolio Dashboard.impact: Delivered interactive waterfall and treemap visuals to help investors assess fund performance and allocation efficiency.

Construction Analytics Dashboard.overview: Power BI solution for Linesight-type construction portfolio management with five tabs (Portfolio Overview, Budget Tracker, Schedule Analysis, Cash Flow, RCA).
Construction Analytics Dashboard.impact: Provided granular visibility into project cost variance and root-cause metrics enabling proactive risk mitigation.

AI Email Response System.overview: LangChain-based agentic assistant that classifies and auto-replies to academic or client emails using vector search and prompt chaining.
AI Email Response System.impact: Reduced average response time by 85% and demonstrated practical GenAI workflow automation.

education.masters: M.S. in Computer Information Systems (Big Data Analytics, AI) – Georgia State University
education.bachelors: B.E. in Electronics Engineering – University of Mumbai
